doc.title: 364 Cranes
doc.plot: After a car accident leaves his girlfriend in a coma, the grieving lover has vowed to fold a paper crane everyday until she comes home. 364 Cranes is a story of a young couple whose turn of luck ultimately tests their commitment and changes their fate forever. It is a story about love and pain. It is a story about the things you hold on to and the things you lose.
